block.p: AVON PRODUCTS, New York, named Brian Connolly, senior vice president for United States sales and operations, to the post of president at its Avon U.S. division.
BIGCHANGE NETWORKS, Washington, named Timothy R. Noonan president and chief operating officer. He had been vice president for business operations at Kaplan.com.
